name: S3 Storage
description: Scalable object storage service for data backup, archival, and analytics

definitions.beginner: S3 is Amazon's cloud storage service where you can store files, photos, videos, and any type of data with unlimited capacity.
definitions.advanced: Amazon S3 (Simple Storage Service) is an object storage service offering industry-leading scalability, data availability, security, and performance with features like versioning, lifecycle management, cross-region replication, and multiple storage classes for cost optimization.

examples.title: Create and Upload to Bucket
examples.description: Set up a new S3 bucket and upload files
examples.code:
# Create a new bucket
aws s3 mb s3://my-company-data-2024

# Upload a single file
aws s3 cp document.pdf s3://my-company-data-2024/

# Upload entire directory
aws s3 sync ./website/ s3://my-company-data-2024/website/ --delete
examples.scenario: Setting up file storage and uploading website assets

examples.title: Website Hosting with S3
examples.description: Configure S3 bucket for static website hosting
examples.code:
# Enable website hosting
aws s3 website s3://my-website-bucket --index-document index.html --error-document error.html

# Upload website files
aws s3 sync ./build/ s3://my-website-bucket/ --delete

# Set public read permissions
aws s3api put-bucket-policy --bucket my-website-bucket --policy file://bucket-policy.json
examples.scenario: Hosting a static website using S3
